title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1320/98 of 25 June 1998 establishing the sugar forecast supply balance for 1998/99 for the smaller Aegean islands provided for in Council Regulation (EEC) No 2019/93
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1320/98 of 25 June 1998 establishing the sugar forecast supply balance for 1998/99 for the smaller Aegean islands provided for in Council Regulation (EEC) No 2019/93
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Pursuant to Article 2 of Regulation (EEC) No 2019/93, the forecast supply balance for sugar originating in the Community for the smaller Aegean islands for the 1998/99 marketing year shall be as laid down in the Annex hereto.
The validity of aid certificates shall expire on the final day of the second month following their issue.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 July 1998.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
